<tr height="17">
<td colspan="4" height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE XII MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p align="right"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">15</font></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr height="17">
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p align="right"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="677">
<tr height="17">
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td height="17" valign="top">
<p><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
- -iii-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">MASTER AGREEMENT</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Master agreement is dated and effective as of October&nbsp;5, 2005 (the &ldquo;<i><u>Effective Date</u></i>&rdquo;), by and between <b>KFx Plant II,
LLC</b>, a Delaware limited liability company (&ldquo;<i><u>Operator</u></i>&rdquo;), and <b>Arch Coal, Inc.</b>, a Delaware corporation (&ldquo;<i><u>Arch Coal</u></i>&rdquo;).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Recitals</font></u></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>WHEREAS</b>, Thunder Basin Coal Company, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company and a subsidiary of Arch Coal (&ldquo;<i><u>TBCC</u></i>&rdquo;), owns
and operates the Coal Creek Mine in Campbell&nbsp;County, Wyoming (the &ldquo;<i><u>Mine</u></i>&rdquo;);</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>WHEREAS</b>, Operator has licensed a proprietary process to upgrade high-moisture content fuels or other carbonaceous materials to solid fuel (including the
patents, licenses, trademarks, know-how, trade secrets and other items derivative or subsumed therein, &ldquo;<i><u>K-Fuel&trade; Process</u></i>&rdquo;) owned by KFx Inc., a Delaware corporation (&ldquo;<i><u>KFx</u></i>&rdquo;); and</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>WHEREAS</b>, the Parties desire to establish the terms and conditions upon which (i)&nbsp;Operator will construct and operate a plant at the Mine (the
&ldquo;<i><u>Plant</u></i>&rdquo;) which will apply the K-Fuel&trade; Process to coal mined by TBCC at the Mine, (ii) Arch Coal Sales Company, Inc., a Delaware corporation and a wholly-owned subsidiary of Arch Coal (&ldquo;<i><u>ACS</u></i>&rdquo;), will, as agent of
TBCC, sell coal produced by TBCC at the Mine to Operator for use in the Plant, (iii) Ark Land Company, a Delaware corporation and a wholly-owned subsidiary of Arch Coal (&ldquo;<i><u>Ark Land</u></i>&rdquo;), may, at Operator&rsquo;s election, sell certain real
property located in Campbell County, Wyoming to Operator to be used for disposal of waste produced by the Plant, and (iv) Arch Coal will have a warrant to make investments in KFx&rsquo;s common stock.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>NOW, THEREFORE</b>, for good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the Parties hereby agree as
follows:</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE I</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><a name="_Toc513905595"></a><a name="_Toc513905817"></a><a name="_Toc513905891"></a><a name="_Toc526331259"></a><a name="_Toc76437631"></a><a name="_Ref76439611"></a><a name="_Toc98128169"></a><a name="_Toc115159618"><b><font size="3" face="Times
New Roman">DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION</font></b></a></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><a name="_Toc491061799"></a><a name="_Toc492201217"></a><a name="_Toc513905596"></a><a name="_Toc513905818"></a><a name="_Toc513905892"></a><a name="_Toc526331260"></a><a name="_Toc76437632"></a><a name="_Toc98128170"></a><a name="_Toc115159619"><font size="3"
face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Definitions</u></font>.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>ACS</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Affiliate</i>&rdquo; of a specified party shall mean any Person or entity directly or indirectly controlling or controlled by, or under direct or
indirect common control with, such party. For the purposes of this definition, &ldquo;<i>control</i>&rdquo;<i></i>(including, with correlative meaning, the terms &ldquo;<i>controlling,</i>&rdquo;<i></i>&ldquo;<i>controlled by</i>&rdquo;<i></i>and &ldquo;<i>under
common control with</i>&rdquo;<i>)</i> means the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct or cause direction of the management and policies of a Person or entity, whether through the ownership of voting securities, by contract or
otherwise.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Agreement</i>&rdquo; means this Master Agreement, the Recitals and all Exhibits and Schedules.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Arch Coal</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Preamble.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-1-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Arch Coal Option</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 2.1.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Arch Coal Option Notice</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 2.1.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Ark Land</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Business Days</i>&rdquo; means all days other than any Saturday, Sunday or federal holiday.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Coal Supply Agreement</i>&rdquo; means the Agreement for Purchase and Sale of Coal by and between Operator and ACS attached hereto as <b>Exhibit
A</b>.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Claim Notice</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 11.4.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Claims</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section&nbsp;11.4.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Data</i>&rdquo; means, with respect to the Site, all (1)&nbsp;abstracts of title and other title information, (2)&nbsp;environmental reports,
(3)&nbsp;all maps, assays, surveys, technical reports, samples and engineering data, and (4)&nbsp;any other data relating to the Site.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Defaulting Party</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 10.2.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Effective Date</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Preamble.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Execution Date</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 2.2.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Fort Union Plant</i>&rdquo; means the plant located at the Fort Union site near Gillette, Wyoming, which will produce K-Fuel&trade;.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Governmental Authority</i>&rdquo; means any federal, state, local, tribal or foreign court, tribunal, legislative, administrative or regulatory
authority or agency, or any division, department or commission of any of the foregoing with jurisdiction over one or both Parties or the subject matter of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Governmental Requirements</i>&rdquo;<i></i>means any applicable Law, ordinance, regulation, permit, consent, order or decree or other requirement or
pronouncement having the effect of law of any Governmental Authority, as in effect from time to time.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Guaranty</i>&rdquo; means the Master Guaranty Agreement to be executed by certain Owners holding at least Seventy-Five Percent (75%) in the aggregate
of the equity ownership interest in Operator in favor of TBCC and ACS attached hereto as <b>Exhibit B</b>.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Indemnified Party</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 11.4.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Indemnifying Party</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 11.4.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Initial Period</i>&rdquo;<i></i>is defined in Section 3.1.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Initial Operator Performance Bond</i>&rdquo; means a bond, letter of credit or other surety from a financial institution rated AA or better by
Standard &amp; Poor&rsquo;s and in a form acceptable to TBCC</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-2-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">in an aggregate amount of not less than One Million Dollars ($1,000,000) obtained by Operator pursuant to Section 3.5.&nbsp;</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>K-Fuel&trade;</i>&rdquo; means the refined, beneficiated coal product resulting from the K-Fuel&trade; Process and containing a minimum BTU of
10,000/lb.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>K-Fuel&trade; Process</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>KFx</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Laws</i>&rdquo; means any law, statute, code, ordinance, treaty, rule, regulation or ruling of any Governmental Authority relating to the Site and
Operator Activities.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>License Agreement</i>&rdquo; means the Surface Access and Use License Agreement executed by TBCC in favor of Operator of even date herewith which
provides for certain activities to be conducted by Operator on the Site prior to the effective date of the Site Lease.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Loss</i>&rdquo; or &ldquo;<i>Losses</i>&rdquo; means any and all losses, costs, damages, demands, penalties, fines, settlements, response, remedial,
reclamation or inspection costs, reasonable expenses (including interest on any amount payable to a third party as a result of the foregoing), liabilities on account of taxes and assessments (including interest and penalties thereon) and any legal, accounting,
auditing, consulting, or other fees and expenses reasonably incurred in connection with investigating or defending any claims, actions or proceedings, whether or not resulting in any liability; provided, however, that the term &ldquo;Losses&rdquo; shall not be deemed
to include lost profits, opportunity costs, any other consequential damages or punitive damages, except and to extent such Losses arise from Third Party Claims.<i></i></font></p>

<p><i><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></i></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Mine</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Moody&rsquo;s</i>&rdquo; means Moody&rsquo;s Investors Service, Inc., and its successors.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Non-Defaulting Party</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 10.2.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Notice Period</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 11.4.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Operating Agreement</i>&rdquo; means the Operating Agreement by and between Operator and TBCC attached hereto as <b>Exhibit C</b>.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Operative Agreements</i>&rdquo; means, collectively, (i) the Coal Supply Agreement; (ii) the Site Lease; (iii) the Operating Agreement; and (iv) the
Guaranty.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Operator</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Preamble.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Operator Activities</i>&rdquo; means any activities conducted by Operator on the Site in compliance with the License Agreement.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Operator Option Period</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 2.1.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Operator Notice</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 2.1.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-3-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Owner</i>&rdquo; means each holder of an equity ownership interest in Operator.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Parties</i>&rdquo; means Arch Coal and Operator, and &ldquo;<i>Party</i>&rdquo; refers to either one of them.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><i><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;Permitted Assignee&rdquo;</font></i> means a Person (i) who is not, has not been in the past five (5) years, nor will be during the Term of this
Agreement, a Producer or an Affiliate of a Producer; and (ii) either (a) whose unsecured debt (unsupported by any affiliate or third party guaranty) has rating of at least BBB by Standard &amp; Poor&rsquo;s or Baa3 by Moody&rsquo;s or (b)&nbsp;who has a net worth in
excess of Two Hundred Million Dollars ($200,000,000).</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Permitted Owner</i>&rdquo; means any of (i) KFx or (ii) a Person (a) who is not, has not been in the past five (5) years, nor will be during the Term
of this Agreement, a Producer or an Affiliate of a Producer, and (b) either (x) whose unsecured debt (unsupported by any affiliate or third party guaranty) has rating of at least BBB by Standard &amp; Poor&rsquo;s or Baa3 by Moody&rsquo;s or (y) who has a net worth
in excess of Fifty Million Dollars ($50,000,000).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Person</i>&rdquo; means any corporation, partnership (whether general, limited or otherwise), limited liability company, trust, association, joint
venture, unincorporated organization, Governmental Authority, or any other legal entity or any natural person.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Plant</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Producer</i>&rdquo; means a Person who derives greater than five percent (5%) of its revenues from the sale of coal in the Powder River Basin in
Wyoming.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Representative</i>&rdquo; means a director, manager, officer, employee, agent or other representative of Operator or Arch Coal.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Site</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals of the License Agreement.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Site Lease</i>&rdquo; means the Site Lease Agreement by and between TBCC, as Lessor, and Operator, as Lessee, of the Site attached hereto as
<b>Exhibit E<i>.</i></b></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Standard &amp; Poor&rsquo;s</i>&rdquo; means Standard &amp; Poor&rsquo;s Ratings Services, a division of The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc., and its
successors.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Stock Purchase and Warrant Agreement</i>&rdquo; means the Stock Purchase and Warrant Agreement by and between KFx and Arch Coal of even date
herewith.</font></p>

<p><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></b></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>TBCC</i>&rdquo; is defined in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Termination Date</i>&rdquo;<i></i>means the date on which this Agreement terminates pursuant to the provisions of Article X.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Third Party Claim</i>&rdquo; means any claim or demand asserted against or sought to be collected from any Party to this Agreement by any Person,
including employees, managers, directors, shareholders, members, officers and agents of the Parties, other than Arch Coal or Operator.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-4-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>

</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;<i>Third Party Grant</i>&rdquo; is defined in Section 3.2.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc85940513"></a><a name="_Toc98128171"></a><a name="_Toc115159620"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>References to
Singular/Plural</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Terms denoting the singular only shall include the plural, and vice versa.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc85940514"></a><a name="_Toc98128172"></a><a name="_Toc115159621"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>References to
Exhibits</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Unless otherwise stated, a reference to the Preamble or a Recital, Article, Section, Schedule or Exhibit is a reference to the Preamble or a Recital, Article, Section, Schedule or Exhibit of this Agreement</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc85940515"></a><a name="_Toc98128173"></a><a name="_Toc115159622"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Numbers and
Headings</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Section numbers and headings are for convenience of reference only, and shall not affect the interpretation of this Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc85940516"></a><a name="_Toc98128174"></a><a name="_Toc115159623"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Gender
References</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Reference to any gender includes the other.</p>

<p><a name="_Toc85940517"></a><a name="_Toc98128175"></a><a name="_Toc115159624"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Including</u></font>.&nbsp; Reference to &ldquo;including&rdquo; means including, but not by way of limitation.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc85940518"></a><a name="_Toc98128176"></a><a name="_Toc115159625"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>References to
Agreement</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Unless otherwise expressly provided in this Agreement, reference to an agreement (including this Agreement), document or instrument is the same as amended, modified, novated or replaced from time to time.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc85940519"></a><a name="_Toc98128177"></a><a name="_Toc115159626"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>References to
Statutes</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Reference to a statute or other legislative act, by-law, rule, regulation or order is to the same as amended, modified or replaced from time to time and to any rule, regulation or order promulgated pursuant to such law.</p>

<p><a name="_Toc526331277"></a><a name="_Toc76437645"></a><a name="_Ref76523242"></a><a name="_Ref76524570"></a><a name="_Toc98128182"></a><a name="_Toc115159627"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>



<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE II</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARCH COAL&rsquo;S OPTION TO ENTER INTO OPERATIVE AGREEMENTS</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>



<p><a name="_Toc526331278"></a><a name="_Toc76437646"></a><a name="_Ref76523263"></a><a name="_Ref78081658"></a><a name="_Ref88467211"></a><a name="_Ref89057225"></a><a name="_Toc98128183"></a><a name="_Ref114038332"></a><a name="_Ref114038464"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159628"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Arch Coal&rsquo;s Option to Enter into Operative Agreements</u></font><a name="_Ref103213888">.&nbsp; If, after
conducting Operator Activities, Operator intends to construct and operate the Plant, Operator shall deliver a notice to Arch Coal after March 1, 2006 but in any event on or before July 1, 2006 (the &ldquo;<i><u>Operator Option Period</u></i>&rdquo;) indicating such
intent (the &ldquo;<i><u>Operator Notice</u></i>&rdquo;).&nbsp; Arch Coal shall have an option (the &ldquo;<i><u>Arch Coal Option</u></i>&rdquo;) for a period of thirty (30) days from its receipt of the Operator Notice, by delivery of notice to Operator (the
&ldquo;<i><u>Arch Coal Option Notice</u></i>&rdquo;), to enter into the Operative Agreements.</a>&nbsp; Upon receipt of the Operator Notice, Arch Coal shall make a good faith determination of the commercial viability of the proposed Plant.&nbsp; In order to make such
determination, Arch Coal shall consider (i) the information supplied to Arch Coal by Operator pursuant to Section 2.3 hereof; (ii) Arch Coal&rsquo;s general knowledge and experience with respect to the potential commercial market for the K-Fuel&trade; product to be
produced and sold by the Plant; and (iii) such other information as Arch Coal may reasonably request from Operator.&nbsp; If, after reviewing such information, Arch Coal determines, in its sole reasonable discretion, that the Plant is not reasonably certain to be
commercially viable for the term of the Operating Agreement, then Arch Coal can refuse to exercise the Arch Coal Option.</p>

<p><a name="_Ref103213880"></a><a name="_Toc115159629"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Operative Agreements</u></font><a name="_Toc103079612"></a>.&nbsp; If Arch Coal exercises the Arch Coal Option by
timely delivery of the Arch Coal Option Notice, then the Parties and their Affiliates, as appropriate, shall, within ten (10) days of delivery of the Arch Coal Option Notice (the &ldquo;<i><u>Execution Date</u></i>&rdquo;),</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-5-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">execute and deliver each of the Operative Agreements in the form attached hereto.&nbsp; Each of the Operative Agreements shall be effective as of the Execution Date.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc115159630"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Delivery Requirements</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Except as prohibited in any existing
confidentiality agreement between Operator and a third party, so long as Operator has used its best efforts to obtain a release of such confidentiality agreement, (a) beginning on February 1, 2006, and on the tenth day of each month thereafter, and (b) upon the date
Operator provides the Operator Notice to Arch Coal, Operator shall deliver to Arch Coal a monthly accounting for the Fort Union Plant for the immediately preceding month, which accounting shall include, (i)&nbsp;the amount and quality of the K-Fuel&trade; produced,
(ii)&nbsp;the amount and quality of the raw coal used as feedstock, (iii)&nbsp;the amount and quality of the screened-off undersize raw coal, (iv) the customers and plants to whom the K-Fuel&trade; was sold, (v)&nbsp;the amount of K-Fuel&trade; Operator shipped to
each of its customers from the Fort Union Plant, (vi)&nbsp;evidence of either firm financing commitments (or other established sources of funds) sufficient to construct and operate the Plant as contemplated by the Operative Agreements or efforts undertaken to secure
such firm financing commitments, and (vii) other information as Arch Coal in its sole reasonable discretion may require to assess whether to exercise the Arch Coal Option.&nbsp; At Arch Coal&rsquo;s request, Operator will also arrange for Arch Coal to meet with
Operator and the customers to whom the K-Fuel&trade; has been sold.</p>

<p><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></b></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><a name="_Toc521666645"></a><a name="_Toc521822031"></a><a name="_Toc521924377"></a><a name="_Toc526331281"></a><a name="_Toc76437650"></a><a name="_Ref76438938"></a><a name="_Ref76439404"></a><a name="_Ref76439562"></a><a name="_Ref76439580"></a><a
name="_Ref76439638"></a><a name="_Ref76521542"></a><a name="_Ref76522617"></a><a name="_Ref76522641"></a><a name="_Ref76525094"></a><a name="_Toc98128187"></a><a name="_Ref103215933"></a><a name="_Toc115159631"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE
III</font></b></a></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">SITE OPERATIONS</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><a name="_Toc521666646"></a><a name="_Toc521822032"></a><a name="_Toc521924378"></a><a name="_Toc526331282"></a><a name="_Toc76437651"></a><a name="_Ref76521666"></a><a name="_Ref76521701"></a><a name="_Ref76524682"></a><a name="_Toc526331283"></a><a name=
"_Ref104807074"></a><a name="_Toc115159632"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Operator Activities</u></font>.&nbsp; During the period from the Effective Date until the earlier to occur of (i)
the Execution Date or (ii) the Termination Date (such period being the &ldquo;<i><u>Initial Period</u></i>&rdquo;), Operator and its Affiliates shall have the right to enter into and conduct Operator Activities on the Site only in accordance with the provisions of
the License Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp; TBCC shall use reasonable efforts to coordinate Operator&rsquo;s entrance onto the Site during the Initial Period, provided that Operator&rsquo;s request for entrance upon the Site is reasonable and during normal business hours and
provided further that Operator provides TBCC at least 24-hours notice of its desire to enter the Site, subject, however in all cases, to existing third party rights and agreements affecting the Site.&nbsp; Operator shall conduct all Operator Activities on the Site in
a good and workmanlike manner and consistent with good mining and engineering practices and in accordance with applicable Laws.&nbsp; Operator shall not conduct any Operator Activities that result, or could reasonably be expected to result, in any adverse impact on
the coal reserves in the Mine or the ability of TBCC to mine on the Site or otherwise interfere with TBCC&rsquo;s activities in the Mine.&nbsp; Operator shall secure all permits, authorizations, approvals, insurance and bonds required to carry out the Operator
Activities.&nbsp; Within ten (10) days of the end of each calendar month, Operator shall provide TBCC with a copy of each permit or authorization applied for or received from a Governmental Authority relating to the Site and a written description and map of
Operator&rsquo;s existing and proposed Operator Activities, excluding any business, financial or operational information.</p>



<p><a name="_Toc521666647"></a><a name="_Toc521822033"></a><a name="_Toc521924379"></a><a name="_Toc526331284"></a><a name="_Toc76437653"></a><a name="_Ref76523679"></a><a name="_Ref76524241"></a><a name="_Toc98128190"></a><a name="_Toc115159633"><font size="3" face=
"Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Third Party Grants</u></font>.&nbsp; Ark Land or TBCC may grant rights in and to the Site to third parties for
right-of-ways, easements or access in and through the Site (each, a &ldquo;<i><u>Third Party Grant</u></i>&rdquo;) where necessary or reasonable for its activities and shall do the same at Operator&rsquo;s request and expense with respect to Operator Activities,
provided that each such Third Party Grant by TBCC at the request of Operator shall (i) have a term no longer than the Initial Period,</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-6-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">(ii) be made in connection with the permitting and development of the Plant, and (iii) be subject to reasonable termination provisions which would allow Ark Land or TBCC, as the case may be, or their successors to terminate
such Third Party Grants on the Termination Date.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc521666648"></a><a name="_Toc521822034"></a><a name="_Toc521924380"></a><a name="_Toc526331285"></a><a name="_Toc76437654"></a><a name="_Ref76524614"></a><a name="_Toc513905602"></a><a name="_Toc513905824"></a><a name="_Toc513905898"></a><a name=
"_Toc521666643"></a><a name="_Toc521822029"></a><a name="_Toc521924375"></a><a name="_Toc526331276"></a><a name="_Toc76437644"></a><a name="_Toc98128191"></a><a name="_Toc115159634"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Data</u></font></a>.&nbsp; During the Initial Period, Arch Coal shall make available to Operator all Data in its possession or reasonably available to
it relating to the Site.&nbsp; Operator may copy any of the Data at Operator&rsquo;s sole cost and expense.&nbsp; Arch Coal makes no representation or warranty as to the accuracy, reliability or completeness of any of the Data, and Operator shall rely on the Data at
its sole risk.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Ref76963387"></a><a name="_Ref88470056"></a><a name="_Toc98128192"></a><a name="_Ref103129452"></a><a name="_Toc115159635"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
3.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Reclamation Obligation for Operator Activities</u></font></a>.&nbsp; In the event that this Agreement terminates (other than as a result of the execution of the Operative Agreements), Operator shall promptly commence
required reclamation obligations for Operator Activities conducted on or affecting the Site and shall use its commercially reasonable efforts to assure that any and all reclamation activities are conducted in a time and manner to avoid interference with any
activities of TBCC and its mining operations.&nbsp; This Section 3.4 shall survive the termination of this Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>



<p><a name="_Ref104809233"></a><a name="_Toc115159636"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Initial Operator Performance Bond</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Prior to
undertaking any Operator Activities or any activities permitted by the License Agreement, Operator, at its sole cost and expense, shall secure, and shall maintain throughout the term of this Agreement and the License Agreement, the Initial Operator Performance Bond
in order to secure Operator&rsquo;s obligations under this Agreement and the License Agreement.&nbsp; The terms of the Initial Operator Performance Bond shall prohibit any amendment, revision, waiver or termination without the express written consent of Arch
Coal.&nbsp; Arch Coal shall have the rights granted under this Agreement to call upon the Initial Operator Performance Bond.&nbsp; The Initial Operator Performance Bond shall survive the termination of this Agreement until Operator has either satisfied all
obligations under this Agreement or has replaced the Initial Operator Performance Bond with the Operator Performance Bond pursuant to the provisions of the Operating Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<tr>

</td>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF ARCH COAL</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" color="black" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Arch Coal represents and warrants to Operator as of the date of this Agreement and as of the Execution Date as follows:</font></p>

<p><font size="3" color="black" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc95874166"></a><a name="_Toc97969629"></a><a name="_Ref493426420"></a><a name="_Toc115159638"></a><a name="_DV_M345"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
4.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Corporate Status and Authority of Arch Coal and its Affiliates</u></font><a name="_DV_M347"></a>.<a name="_DV_M348"></a>&nbsp; Arch Coal and each of its Affiliates party to the Operative Agreements are entities validly
existing and in good standing under the laws of each entity&rsquo;s state of formation and are in good standing as foreign entities in the State of Wyoming.&nbsp; Arch Coal and its Affiliates have the requisite power and authority to execute and deliver this
Agreement and the Operative Agreements to which they are a party, perform their obligations under such agreements and to consummate the transactions and perform the obligations imposed upon them as contemplated by this Agreement and the Operative Agreements.&nbsp;
The execution, delivery and performance by Arch Coal and its Affiliates of this Agreement and the Operative Agreements have been duly authorized by Arch Coal and its Affiliates party to the Operative Agreements and constitute all necessary action on the part of Arch
Coal and such Affiliates for such execution, delivery and performance.&nbsp; This Agreement</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-7-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">has been duly executed and delivered by Arch Coal and, assuming valid execution and delivery by Operator, constitutes the valid and binding obligation of Arch Coal and its Affiliates, enforceable against Arch Coal in
accordance with its terms, except as such enforceability may be limited by applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other laws of general application referring to or affecting the enforcement of creditors&rsquo; rights.&nbsp; Upon execution,
the Operative Agreements shall be duly executed and delivered by Arch Coal and its Affiliates as appropriate and shall constitute the valid and binding obligations of Arch Coal and such Affiliates, enforceable against such companies in accordance with their
respective terms, except as such enforceability may be limited by applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other laws of general application referring to or affecting the enforcement of creditors&rsquo; rights.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc95874167"></a><a name="_Toc97969630"></a><a name="_Ref493426467"></a><a name="_Toc115159639"></a><a name="_DV_M349"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
4.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>No Conflicts</u></font><a name="_DV_M351"></a>.<a name="_DV_M352"></a>&nbsp; <a name="_DV_M353"></a>Except as contemplated thereunder, the execution, delivery and performance by Arch Coal and its Affiliates of this Agreement
and the Operative Agreements and the consummation of the transactions contemplated by such agreements will not result in (i) any conflict with or violation of the organizational documents of Arch Coal and its Affiliates, or (ii) any breach or violation of or default
under, or result in the creation or imposition of any lien under, any statute, regulation, judgment, order or decree, or any mortgage, deed of trust, indenture, security agreement, pledge or any other similar instrument to which Arch Coal or its Affiliates is a party
or by which Arch Coal or its Affiliates or any of their properties or assets are bound.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Ref90768112"></a><a name="_Toc115159640"></a><a name="_DV_M354"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Consents</u></font>.&nbsp; No consent,
approval or authorization of or filing with any Governmental Authority or third party is required on the part of Arch Coal or its Affiliates in connection with the execution and delivery of this Agreement and the Operative Agreements or the consummation of the
transactions contemplated by such Agreements,except consents required from Governmental Authorities or third party lessors with respect to the Site Lease.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc95874171"></a><a name="_Toc97969634"></a><a name="_Ref493427732"></a><a name="_Toc115159641"></a><a name="_DV_M356"></a><a name="_DV_M362"></a><a name="_DV_M371"></a><a name="_DV_M372"></a><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Litigation</u></font><a name="_DV_M374"></a>.<a name="_DV_M375"></a>&nbsp; There is no proceeding pending or, to Arch Coal and its Affiliates&rsquo;
knowledge, threatened against or affecting any of them which would have a material <a name="_Toc95874172"></a><a name="_Toc97969635"></a><a name="_Ref491867132"></a><a name="_Ref491872005"></a><a name="_DV_M376"></a>adverse effect on the transactions contemplated by
this Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>



<p><a name="_Toc95874177"></a><a name="_Toc97969640"></a><a name="_Toc115159642"></a><a name="_DV_M381"></a><a name="_DV_M398"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
4.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Brokers</u></font><a name="_DV_M400"></a>.&nbsp; All negotiations relative to this Agreement and the transactions contemplated hereby have been carried out by Arch Coal and its Affiliates directly with Operator without the
intervention of any Person on behalf of Arch Coal and its Affiliates in such manner as to give rise to any valid claim by any Person against Operator for a finder&rsquo;s fee, brokerage commission or similar payment.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" color="black" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Operator represents and warrants to Arch Coal as of the date of this Agreement and as of the Execution Date as follows:</font></p>

<p><font size="3" color="black" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc95874179"></a><a name="_Toc97969643"></a><a name="_Toc115159644"></a><a name="_DV_M407"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Corporate
Status and Authority</u></font><a name="_DV_M409"></a>.&nbsp; Operator is an entity validly existing and in good standing under the laws of its state of formation and is in good standing as a foreign entity in the State of Wyoming.&nbsp; Operator has all requisite
power and authority to execute and deliver this</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-8-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Agreement, to perform its obligations hereunder and to consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement.&nbsp; Operator has all requisite power and authority to execute and deliver the Operative Agreements, to
perform its obligations thereunder and to consummate the transactions contemplated by the Operative Agreements.&nbsp; The execution, delivery and performance by Operator of this Agreement, the Operative Agreements have been duly authorized by Operator and constitute
all necessary action on the part of Operator for such execution, delivery and performance.&nbsp; This Agreement has been duly executed and delivered by Operator and, assuming valid execution and delivery by Arch Coal, constitutes the valid and binding obligation of
Operator, enforceable against Operator in accordance with its terms, except as such enforceability may be limited by applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other laws of general application referring to or affecting the enforcement of
creditors&rsquo; rights.&nbsp; Upon execution, the Operative Agreements shall be duly executed and delivered by Operator and shall constitute the valid and binding obligations of Operator, enforceable against Operator in accordance with their respective terms, except
as such enforceability may be limited by applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other laws of general application referring to or affecting the enforcement of creditors&rsquo; rights.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc95874180"></a><a name="_Toc97969644"></a><a name="_Ref493428166"></a><a name="_Toc115159645"></a><a name="_DV_M410"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
5.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>No Conflicts</u></font><a name="_DV_M412"></a>.<a name="_DV_M413"></a>&nbsp; <a name="_DV_M414"></a>The execution, delivery and performance by Operator of this Agreement and the consummation of the transactions contemplated
hereby will not result in:&nbsp; (i)&nbsp;any conflict with the organizational documents of Operator or (ii)&nbsp;any breach or violation of or default under, or result in the creation or imposition of any lien under, any statute, regulation, judgment, order or
decree, or any mortgage, deed of trust, indenture, security agreement, pledge or any other similar instrument to which Operator is a party or by which Operator or any of its properties or assets are bound. The execution, delivery and performance by Operator of the
Operative Agreements and the consummation of the transactions contemplated thereby will not result in:&nbsp; (i)&nbsp;any conflict with the organizational documents of Operator or (ii)&nbsp;any breach or violation of or default under, or result in the creation or
imposition of any lien under, any statute, regulation, judgment, order or decree, or any mortgage, deed of trust, indenture, security agreement, pledge or any other similar instrument to which Operator is a party or by which Operator or any of its properties or
assets are bound.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc115159646"></a><a name="_DV_M415"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Governmental Consents</u></font>.&nbsp; No consent, approval or
authorization of or filing with any Governmental Authority is required on the part of Operator in connection with the execution and delivery of this Agreement, the Operative Agreements or the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby and thereby, except
permits and consents required from Governmental Authorities or third party lessors with respect to the Site Lease<b>.<a name="_Toc40479354"></a></b></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc95874181"></a><a name="_Toc97969645"></a><a name="_Toc115159647"></a><a name="_DV_M416"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Independent
Evaluation</u></font><a name="_DV_M418"></a>.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Operator has reviewed or received copies
of, or had the opportunity to review, such information from Arch Coal and its Affiliates as it has requested, and has had the opportunity to make such inquiry of Representatives of Arch Coal and its Affiliates as Operator deems appropriate.</font><a name=
"_Toc40479355"></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_DV_M419"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; OPERATOR
ACKNOWLEDGES THAT, EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THIS AGREEMENT, NONE OF ARCH COAL AND ITS AFFILIATES OR ANY AFFILIATE, EMPLOYEE OR AGENT OF ARCH COAL AND ITS AFFILIATES HAS</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-9-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">MADE ANY REPRESENTATION, PROMISE, COVENANT OR WARRANTY REGARDING ANY OF ARCH COAL AND ITS AFFILIATES, ITS PROPERTIES, ASSETS, BUSINESS, OPERATIONS, LIABILITIES OR OBLIGATIONS OR OTHERWISE.&nbsp; ARCH COAL AND ITS AFFILIATES
DISCLAIMS ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE WITH RESPECT TO THE TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED BY THIS AGREEMENT AND THE OPERATIVE AGREEMENTS.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc95874182"></a><a name="_Toc97969646"></a><a name="_Toc115159648"></a><a name="_DV_M420"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<u>Brokers</u></font><a name="_DV_M422"></a>. All negotiations relative to this Agreement and the transactions contemplated hereby have been carried out by Operator directly with Arch Coal without the intervention of any Person on behalf of Operator in such manner as
to give rise to any valid claim by any Person against Arch Coal or its Affiliates for a finder&rsquo;s fee, brokerage commission or similar payment.<a name="_Toc40479356"></a></p>

<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">COVENANTS</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>

<p><a name="_Toc115159650"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 6.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Additional Covenants of Arch Coal</u></font>.&nbsp; From the Effective Date until the end of the Initial Period,
Arch Coal shall, or, if applicable, cause its Affiliates to:</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Maintain existence and remain in good
standing as a foreign entity under the laws of the State of Wyoming;</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Ref76869824"></a><a name="_Ref90799751"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Maintain the Site and fully and timely pay all of its obligations with respect to the Site, including, without limitations, property taxes and lease payments;</font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Except for existing liens, liens executed
in connection with the financing activities of Arch Coal or its Affiliates and Third Party Grants, prevent the placing of any lien upon or in relation to the Site, and promptly cure and remove any such lien upon or in relation to the Site; and</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Until the earliest to occur of (i) the
date on which Operator notifies Arch Coal that it will not construct the Plant, (ii) July 1, 2006, in the event Operator fails to deliver the Operator Notice to Arch Coal on or before such date, (iii) Arch Coal&rsquo;s election not to exercise the Arch Coal Option,
or (iv) the execution and delivery of the Coal Supply Agreement, Arch Coal shall not enter into any contract for the sale of coal which would interfere with its ability to perform its obligations under the Coal Supply Agreement.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Ref105320908"></a><a name="_Toc115159651"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 6.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Additional Covenant of Operator</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Operator
shall be owned solely by Permitted Owners.</p>

<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><a name="_Toc513905622"></a><a name="_Toc513905844"></a><a name="_Toc513905918"></a><a name="_Toc526331302"></a><a name="_Toc76437666"></a><a name="_Toc98128197"></a><a name="_Toc115159652"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE
VII</font></b></a></p>
</td>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">CONFIDENTIALITY</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905623"></a><a name="_Toc513905845"></a><a name="_Toc513905919"></a><a name="_Toc526331303"></a><a name="_Ref84899974"></a><a name="_Ref91416107"></a><a name="_Toc92017414"></a><a name="_Toc98128198"></a><a name="_Toc115159653"><font size="3" face=
"Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 7.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Confidentiality</u></font></a>.&nbsp; <a name="_Toc90801170"></a><a name="_Toc92017415"></a><a name="_Toc98128199">The terms and conditions
(including, without limitation, price) set forth in this Agreement are considered by the Parties to be confidential and proprietary information.&nbsp; Neither Party shall disclose any such information to any third party without the other Party&rsquo;s prior written
consent; provided, however, that no such consent shall be needed</a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-10-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">where such disclosure (i) is required by law, regulation, or regulatory agencies having jurisdiction over one of the Parties or (ii) is necessary in connection with a Party's assertion of a claim or defense in a judicial or
administrative proceeding and that in either of these events, the Party intending to make such disclosure shall advise the other Party in advance and cooperate to the extent practicable to minimize the disclosure of any such information.&nbsp; Notwithstanding the
foregoing provisions of this Section 7.1, either Party may disclose any information contained in this Agreement to a prospective purchaser of the stock, equity interests or assets of that Party or to a lender in connection with a financing transaction, or in the case
of TBCC only to a prospective purchaser of the Mine; provided, however, that any such prospective purchaser or lender shall be bound by the provisions of this Section 7.1.&nbsp; For purposes of this Section 7.1, the term &ldquo;<i>third party</i>&rdquo; shall not
include (i) a Party&rsquo;s parent, subsidiary, Affiliate, or sister corporation or (ii) a Party&rsquo;s respective officers, directors, employees, legal advisers, accountants, lessors or consultant</font>s; provided further, that no exception to the confidentiality
provisions set forth in this Section 7.1 shall allow either Party to make any press release without the other Party&rsquo;s prior written consent.</p>



<p><a name="_Toc513905626"></a><a name="_Toc513905848"></a><a name="_Toc513905922"></a><a name="_Toc526331305"></a><a name="_Toc76437669"></a><a name="_Ref76439317"></a><a name="_Ref76524906"></a><a name="_Toc98128202"></a><a name="_Toc115159654"><font size="3" face=
"Times New Roman"></font></a></p>



<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE VIII</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">CONSENTS AND APPROVALS</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><a name="_Toc115159655"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 8.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Consents and Authorizations</u></font>.&nbsp; Arch Coal, at Operator&rsquo;s request and expense, shall use
commercially reasonable efforts to assist Operator and KFx in obtaining such consents, authorizations and approvals from Governmental Authorities and third parties as shall be necessary or appropriate to permit the consummation of the transactions contemplated by
this Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><a name="_Toc513905629"></a><a name="_Toc513905851"></a><a name="_Toc513905925"></a><a name="_Toc526331306"></a><a name="_Toc76437670"></a><a name="_Ref76524812"></a><a name="_Ref76524926"></a><a name="_Toc98128203"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159656"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE IX</font></b></a></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ASSIGNMENT</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><a name="_Toc521666668"></a><a name="_Toc521822054"></a><a name="_Toc521924400"></a><a name="_Toc98128204"></a><a name="_Toc115159657"></a><a name="_Toc525356079"></a><a name="_Toc525727861"></a><a name="_Toc526171637"></a><a name="_Toc526305028"></a><a name=
"_Toc526331307"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 9.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Binding</u></font>.&nbsp; <a name="_Toc76436489"></a><a name="_Toc76437671"></a><a name="_Toc76522014"></a><a name=
"_Toc76522235"></a><a name="_Toc76522449"></a><a name="_Toc76810744"></a><a name="_Toc76810829"></a><a name="_Toc76869327"></a><a name="_Toc76870121"></a><a name="_Toc76870208"></a><a name="_Toc76870941"></a>This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the
benefit of the Parties and their respective successors and permitted assigns.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc521666669"></a><a name="_Toc521822055"></a><a name="_Toc521924401"></a><a name="_Toc526305029"></a><a name="_Toc526331308"></a><a name="_Toc98128205"></a><a name="_Ref105332351"></a><a name="_Toc115159658"></a><a name="_Toc525356080"></a><a name=
"_Toc525727862"></a><a name="_Toc526171638"></a><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 9.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Permitted Assignments</u></font><a name="_Toc76436490"></a><a name=
"_Toc76437672"></a><a name="_Toc76522015"></a><a name="_Toc76522236"></a><a name="_Toc76522450"></a><a name="_Toc76810745"></a><a name="_Toc76810830"></a><a name="_Toc76869328"></a><a name="_Toc76870122"></a><a name="_Toc76870209"></a><a name="_Toc76870942"></a>.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Operator shall not assign all or any part
of its interest, rights or obligations in and to this Agreement without the prior written consent of Arch Coal, which consent may be withheld at Arch Coal&rsquo;s sole discretion</font>; provided however, that, consent shall not be required for a transfer by Operator
to a Permitted Assignee.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc525727863"></a><a name="_Toc526171639"></a><a name="_Toc526305030"></a><a name="_Toc526331309"></a><a name="_Toc76436491"></a><a name="_Toc76437673"></a><a name="_Toc76522016"></a><a name="_Toc76522237"></a><a name="_Toc76522451"></a><a name=
"_Toc76810746"></a><a name="_Toc76810831"></a><a name="_Toc76869329"></a><a name="_Toc76870123"></a><a name="_Toc76870210"></a><a name="_Toc76870943"></a><a name="_Toc76436491"></a><a name="_Toc76437673"></a><a name="_Toc76522016"></a><a name="_Toc76522237"></a><a
name="_Toc76522451"></a><a name="_Toc76810746"></a><a name="_Toc76810831"></a><a name="_Toc76869329"></a><a name="_Toc76870123"></a><a name="_Toc76870210"></a><a name="_Toc76870943"></a><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Arch Coal may, without the prior written consent of Operator, (i) assign
all (but not less than all) of this Agreement and transfer all (but not less than all) of the Site to a Person, provided that such assignee agrees in writing to be bound by all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement</font>; and (ii) assign any or all of the
Site to an Affiliate, provided such Affiliate agrees in writing to be bound by all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc526305031"></a><a name="_Toc526331310"></a><a name="_Toc76436492"></a><a name="_Toc76437674"></a><a name="_Toc76522017"></a><a name="_Toc76522238"></a><a name="_Toc76522452"></a><a name="_Toc76810747"></a><a name="_Toc76810832"></a><a name=
"_Toc76869330"></a><a name="_Toc76870124"></a><a name="_Toc76870211"></a><a name="_Toc76870944"></a><a name="_Toc76436492"></a><a name="_Toc76437674"></a><a name="_Toc76522017"></a><a name="_Toc76522238"></a><a name="_Toc76522452"></a><a name="_Toc76810747"></a><a
name="_Toc76810832"></a><a name="_Toc76869330"></a><a name="_Toc76870124"></a><a name="_Toc76870211"></a><a name="_Toc76870944"></a><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any transfer or assignment in violation of this Article IX shall be void
and of no effect.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-11-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No assignment of this Agreement may be
made without a corresponding assignment of the License Agreement.&nbsp; Any agreed transfer or assignment shall be subject in all cases to the continuance of the Initial Operator Performance Bond as set out in Section 3.5.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">

<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><a name="_Toc513905630"></a><a name="_Toc513905852"></a><a name="_Toc513905926"></a><a name="_Toc526331311"></a><a name="_Toc76437675"></a><a name="_Ref76525042"></a><a name="_Ref76525059"></a><a name="_Toc98128206"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159659"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE X</font></b></a></p>
</td>
