<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">TERMINATION AND DEFAULT</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><a name="_Toc505064246"></a><a name="_Toc513263597"></a><a name="_Toc513905631"></a><a name="_Toc513905853"></a><a name="_Toc513905927"></a><a name="_Toc526331312"></a><a name="_Toc76437676"></a><a name="_Toc98128207"></a><a name="_Ref91469727"></a><a name=
"_Toc98140374"></a><a name="_Toc115159660"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 10.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Termination</u></font><a name="_Toc521666672"></a><a name="_Toc521822058"></a><a name="_Toc521924404"></a><a name=
"_Toc526331313"></a><a name="_Toc76437677"></a><a name="_Ref76522748"></a><a name="_Ref76523226"></a><a name="_Ref76524957"></a><a name="_Ref76524969"></a><a name="_Ref76525023"></a><a name="_Toc98128208">.</a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Agreement may be terminated and the
transactions contemplated by this Agreement may be abandoned, for any reason, by the mutual written consent of the Parties.&nbsp;</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc505064247"></a><a name="_Toc513263598"></a><a name="_Toc513905632"></a><a name="_Toc513905854"></a><a name="_Toc513905928"></a><a name="_Toc526331314"></a><a name="_Toc76437678"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Agreement shall terminate upon the termination of the License
Agreement.</font></a><a name="_Toc98128209"></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Agreement shall terminate upon the
execution of the Operative Agreements.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>



<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Operator may terminate this Agreement at
any time upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to Arch Coal.<a name="_Toc526331315"></a></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>



<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Operator has not delivered the
Operator Notice during the Operator Option Period, then this Agreement shall terminate and neither Arch Coal nor Operator shall have any further liability or obligations under this Agreement, except for those provisions of this Agreement that explicitly survive
termination and as otherwise set forth in this Article X.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Arch Coal has not delivered the
Arch Coal Option Notice within thirty (30) days of its receipt of the complying Operator Notice, then this Agreement shall terminate and neither Arch Coal nor Operator shall have any further liability or obligations under this Agreement, except for those provisions
of this Agreement that explicitly survive termination and as otherwise set forth in this Article X.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Ref103512566"></a><a name="_Ref103512627"></a><a name="_Toc115159661"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 10.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Default</u></font></a>.&nbsp; In the event of a
material default under this Agreement or the License Agreement on the part of a Party (the &ldquo;<i><u>Defaulting Party</u></i>&rdquo;), the non-defaulting Party (the &ldquo;<i><u>Non-Defaulting Party</u></i>&rdquo;) shall give to Defaulting Party written notice
specifying the particular default or defaults asserted, and Defaulting Party shall have thirty (30) days after the receipt of said notice within which either (i) to cure such specified default or defaults or (ii) to diligently undertake to cure the default or
defaults and promptly thereafter cure them.&nbsp; In the event such curative action is not so completed or diligent efforts to cure such defaults are not undertaken within the applicable thirty (30) day period and thereafter diligently pursued to completion within
sixty (60) days from receipt of notice, the Non-Defaulting Party may elect to terminate this Agreement by notice to Defaulting Party.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905634"></a><a name="_Toc513905856"></a><a name="_Toc513905930"></a><a name="_Toc526331316"></a><a name="_Toc76437680"></a><a name="_Toc98128211"></a><a name="_Toc115159662"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 10.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Return of Data</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Within ten (10) days of the Termination Date, Operator shall as soon as practicable return to Arch Coal all Data and other
information furnished by Arch Coal to Operator relating to the Site or destroy such Data and certify that such Data has been destroyed.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-12-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><a name="_Toc513905636"></a><a name="_Toc513905858"></a><a name="_Toc513905932"></a><a name="_Toc526331318"></a><a name="_Toc76437682"></a><a name="_Toc98128213"></a><a name="_Toc115159663"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 10.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Surrender of Possession and Removal of Equipment</u></font></a>.&nbsp; On the Termination Date, unless Operator and TBCC execute the Site Lease, Operator shall
surrender possession of the Site to TBCC, subject to the condition that Operator shall have the right at any time within ninety (90) days after such surrender to complete any required reclamation obligations and remove all of its tools, equipment, machinery,
supplies, fixtures, buildings, structures and other property erected or placed on the Site, provided, however, that Operator (i) shall use its reasonable efforts to remove such equipment as promptly as possible and in any event within ninety (90) days, and shall take
all reasonable steps to assure that such equipment is removed in a time and manner to avoid interference with any mining activities of TBCC and (ii) shall complete its reclamation obligations set forth in 0 as promptly as possible.&nbsp; If the property described in
clause (i) is not removed within the time period set forth above, at Arch Coal&rsquo;s election, (x) the title to such property shall automatically be transferred to Arch Coal or (y) Arch Coal may remove any such property and dispose of it in a commercially
reasonable manner at the expense of Operator.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><a name="_Toc513905637"></a><a name="_Toc513905859"></a><a name="_Toc513905933"></a><a name="_Toc526331319"></a><a name="_Toc76437683"></a><a name="_Ref76439383"></a><a name="_Ref76439435"></a><a name="_Ref76439625"></a><a name="_Ref76439659"></a><a
name="_Ref76439711"></a><a name="_Ref76439731"></a><a name="_Ref76439754"></a><a name="_Ref76524638"></a><a name="_Ref76524707"></a><a name="_Ref76525005"></a><a name="_Ref76525187"></a><a name="_Ref86660224"></a><a name="_Toc98128214"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159664"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE XI</font></b></a></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">INDEMNIFICATION</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905638"></a><a name="_Toc513905860"></a><a name="_Toc513905934"></a><a name="_Toc526331320"></a><a name="_Toc76437684"></a><a name="_Toc98128215"></a><a name="_Ref103230885"></a><a name="_Toc115159665"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 11.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Survival and Independence of Indemnification Obligations</u></font></a>.&nbsp; The indemnification provisions of this Article XI relate to all indemnification
obligations of the Parties under this Agreement, except that the survival provisions of this Section 11.1 shall not apply to the indemnity obligations set forth in the Operative Agreements.&nbsp; The indemnification obligations of the Parties set forth in this
Article XI shall survive until (but only until) (i) the Execution Date, or (ii) if this Agreement is terminated prior to the Execution Date, the second anniversary of the Termination Date.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905639"></a><a name="_Toc513905861"></a><a name="_Toc513905935"></a><a name="_Toc521666679"></a><a name="_Toc521822064"></a><a name="_Toc521924410"></a><a name="_Toc526331321"></a><a name="_Toc76437685"></a><a name="_Toc98128216"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159666"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 11.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Indemnification of Operator</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Arch Coal shall indemnify and hold Operator and its managers,
members, directors, shareholders, Affiliates, employees and agents harmless from and against all claims, causes of action and Losses that Operator may suffer, sustain or become subject to by reason of or arising out of (i) any material breach of a representation,
warranty or covenant of Arch Coal contained in this Agreement or any other agreement or instrument executed by Arch Coal pursuant to this Agreement and (ii) claims arising out of activities or operations of or on behalf of Arch Coal or its Affiliates on or relating
to the Site.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905640"></a><a name="_Toc513905862"></a><a name="_Toc513905936"></a><a name="_Toc521666680"></a><a name="_Toc521822065"></a><a name="_Toc521924411"></a><a name="_Toc526331322"></a><a name="_Toc76437686"></a><a name="_Toc98128217"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159667"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 11.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Indemnification of Arch Coal</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Operator shall indemnify and hold Arch Coal and its managers,
members, directors, shareholders, Affiliates, employees and agents harmless from and against all claims, causes of action and Losses that Arch Coal may suffer, sustain or become subject to by reason of or arising out of (i) any material breach of a representation,
warranty or covenant of Operator contained in this Agreement or any other agreement or instrument executed by Operator pursuant to this Agreement and<b></b>(ii) claims arising out of activities or operations of or on behalf of Operator or its Affiliates on or
relating to the Site.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc521822066"></a><a name="_Toc521924412"></a><a name="_Toc521666681"></a><a name="_Toc526331323"></a><a name="_Toc76437687"></a><a name="_Ref76522505"></a><a name="_Ref76522564"></a><a name="_Ref76522665"></a><a name="_Ref76523044"></a><a name=
"_Ref76523062"></a><a name="_Ref76524652"></a><a name="_Ref76524722"></a><a name="_Ref85878715"></a><a name="_Ref85880516"></a><a name="_Toc98128218"></a><a name="_Toc115159668"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 11.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Claims</u></font></a>.&nbsp; In the event that either Party (the &ldquo;<i><u>Indemnified Party</u></i>&rdquo;) has a claim or in the event that any claim or
demand for which the other Party (the &ldquo;<i><u>Indemnifying Party</u></i>&rdquo;) would be liable to the Indemnified Party is asserted against or sought to be collected by a third party (&ldquo;<i><u>Claims</u></i>&rdquo;), the Indemnified Party shall promptly
notify the Indemnifying Party of such Claim specifying the nature of such Claim and the amount or the estimated amount thereof to the extent then feasible (which estimate shall not be conclusive of the final amount of such Claim) (the</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-13-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&ldquo;<i><u>Claim Notice</u></i>&rdquo;), provided that the failure to promptly notify the Indemnifying Party shall not operate to waive, reduce or extinguish the Indemnified Party&rsquo;s rights hereunder unless and to the
extent such failure prejudices the Indemnifying Party.&nbsp; The Indemnifying Party shall have 10 Business Days from its receipt of the Claim Notice (the &ldquo;<i><u>Notice Period</u></i>&rdquo;) to notify the Indemnified Party (i)&nbsp;whether or not the
Indemnifying Party disputes its liability to the Indemnified Party with respect to such Claim and (ii)&nbsp;if it does not dispute such liability, whether or not it desires, at its sole cost and expense, to defend the Indemnified Party against such Claim; provided,
however, that the Indemnified Party is authorized prior to and during the Notice Period to file any motion, answer or other pleading that it shall deem necessary or appropriate to protect its interests; provided further, that the Indemnified Party shall use its
reasonable efforts to provide the Indemnifying Party with notice of any such filing and an opportunity to comment on such filing.&nbsp; In the event that the Indemnifying Party notifies the Indemnified Party within the Notice Period that the Indemnifying Party does
not dispute such liability and desire to defend against such Claim, then except as provided below, the Indemnifying Party shall have the right to defend by appropriate proceedings, which proceedings shall be promptly settled or prosecuted to a final conclusion in
such a manner as to avoid any risk of the Indemnified Party becoming subject to liability for any other matter.&nbsp; If the Indemnified Party desires to participate in, but not control, any such defense or settlement it may do so at its sole cost and expense.&nbsp;
If, in the reasonable opinion of the Indemnified Party, any such Claim involves an issue or matter that could have an adverse effect on the business, operations, assets, properties or prospects of the Indemnified Party or an Affiliate of the Indemnified Party, the
Indemnified Party shall have the right to control the defense or settlement of any such Claim, and its reasonable costs and expenses shall be included as part of the indemnification obligations of the Indemnifying Party under this Article XI.&nbsp; If the
Indemnifying Party disputes its liability with respect to such Claim or elects not to defend against such Claim, whether by not giving timely notice as provided above or otherwise, then the amount of any such Claim, or, if the same be contested by the Indemnifying
Party, then that portion of such Claim as to which such defense is unsuccessful, shall be conclusively deemed to be a liability of the Indemnifying Party under this Agreement (subject, if the Indemnifying Party has timely disputed liability, to a determination that
the disputed liability is covered by these indemnification provisions).&nbsp; Nothing herein shall be deemed to prevent the Indemnified Party from making a Claim hereunder for potential or contingent Claims provided the Claim Notice sets forth the specific basis for
any such potential or contingent Claim and the estimated amount of a Claim to the extent then feasible and the Indemnified Party has reasonable grounds to believe that such a Claim will be made.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc526331324"></a><a name="_Toc76437688"></a><a name="_Ref76440104"></a><a name="_Toc98128219"></a><a name="_Toc115159669"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
11.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Limitations</u></font></a>.&nbsp; THE PARTIES EXPRESSLY WAIVE AND FOREGO ANY RIGHT TO RECOVER ANY SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES IN ANY ARBITRATION, LAWSUIT, LITIGATION OR PROCEEDING ARISING OUT OF OR RESULTING
FROM ANY CLAIM MADE PURSUANT TO THIS 0, EXCEPT TO THE EXTENT ARISING OUT OF A THIRD PARTY CLAIM FOR which A PARTY IS ENTITLED TO INDEMNIFICATION HEREUNDER FROM THE OTHER PARTY.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-14-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><a name="_Toc513905652"></a><a name="_Toc513905874"></a><a name="_Toc513905948"></a><a name="_Toc526331335"></a><a name="_Toc76437699"></a><a name="_Toc98128220"></a><a name="_Toc115159670"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARTICLE
XII</font></b></a></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513263603"></a><a name="_Toc513905653"></a><a name="_Toc513905875"></a><a name="_Toc513905949"></a><a name="_Toc526331336"></a><a name="_Toc76437700"></a><a name="_Toc98128221"></a><a name="_Toc115159671"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Exclusivity of Representations and Warranties; Relationship Between the Parties</u></font></a>.&nbsp; It is the explicit intent and understanding of the Parties
that none of the Parties nor any of their respective Affiliates, Representatives, advisors or agents is making any representation or warranty whatsoever, oral or written, express or implied, other than those set forth in this Agreement and none of the Parties is
relying on any statement, representation or warranty, oral or written, express or implied, made by any other party or such other party&rsquo;s Affiliates, Representatives, advisors or agents, except for the representations and warranties expressly set forth in such
agreements.&nbsp; The Parties agree that this is an arm&rsquo;s-length transaction in which the Parties&rsquo; undertakings and obligations are limited to the performance of their obligations under this Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513263604"></a><a name="_Toc513905654"></a><a name="_Toc513905876"></a><a name="_Toc513905950"></a><a name="_Toc526331337"></a><a name="_Toc76437701"></a><a name="_Ref85878622"></a><a name="_Ref89679201"></a><a name="_Toc98128222"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159672"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Use of Names</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Operator will not use any name affiliated with Arch Coal, TBCC, ACS, any
Affiliate of such entities, or any name affiliated with such entities&rsquo; mines in printed materials, signage, websites or similar identifying materials.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc115159673"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>No Other Representations Nor Grant of Reliance</u></font></a><a name="_Ref89678975">.&nbsp; Except for
the express representations and warranties made by Arch Coal in this Agreement, Arch Coal makes no representation or warranty to Operator <font color="black">with respect to any reports or title opinions delivered by or on behalf of Arch Coal to Operator.&nbsp;
Operator acknowledges that it is taking full responsibility for making its own evaluation of the adequacy and accuracy of all such reports and title opinions furnished to it.</font></a><font color="black">&nbsp; In producing any Data to Operator, Arch Coal explicitly
is not granting any right of reliance to Operator or any Affiliate of Operator relating to the information, analysis or projections provided in such documents.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc98128223"></a><a name="_Toc115159674"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Amendment</u></font></a>.&nbsp; This Agreement shall not be amended or
modified except by an agreement in writing duly executed by each of the Parties.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Ref491873071"></a><a name="_Toc513263605"></a><a name="_Toc513905655"></a><a name="_Toc513905877"></a><a name="_Toc513905951"></a><a name="_Toc526331338"></a><a name="_Toc76437702"></a><a name="_Ref76525250"></a><a name="_Toc98128224"></a><a name=
"_Ref105411176"></a><a name="_Toc115159675"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Notices</u></font></a>.&nbsp; <a name="_Toc505064261"></a><a name=
"_Toc513263606"></a><a name="_Toc513905656"></a><a name="_Toc513905878"></a><a name="_Toc513905952"></a><a name="_Toc526331339"></a><a name="_Toc76437703">All notices provided for herein shall be given to the Parties at the following addresses:</a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">or at such other address or number as shall be designated by either Party in a notice to the other Party given in accordance with this Section 12.5.&nbsp; Except as otherwise provided in this Agreement, all such communications
shall be deemed to have been duly given, (a)&nbsp;in the case of a notice sent by regular mail, on the date actually received by the addressee, (b)&nbsp;in the case of a notice sent by registered or certified mail, on the date receipted for (or refused) on the return
receipt, (c)&nbsp;in the case of a notice delivered by hand, when personally delivered, (d)&nbsp;in the case of a notice sent by facsimile or electronic transmission, upon transmission subject to telephone confirmation of receipt, and (e)&nbsp;in the case of a notice
sent by overnight mail or overnight courier service, the date delivered at the designated address, in each case given or addressed as aforesaid.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc98128225"></a><a name="_Toc115159676"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Entire Agreement</u></font></a>.&nbsp; This Agreement and the Schedules and
Exhibits which are incorporated by reference, and the License Agreement represent the entire agreement and understanding between the Parties with respect to the subject matter of this Agreement and supersedes, replaces and is in lieu of any and all prior oral and
written agreements, arrangements and understandings between the Parties, including any outstanding agreements granting Operator access to the Site, with respect to such subject matter and can be amended, supplemented or changed, and any provision hereof can be
waived, only by a written instrument making specific reference to this Agreement signed by the Party against whom enforcement of any such amendment, supplement, mo<a name="_Toc505064263">dification or waiver is sought.</a><a name="_Toc505064264"></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513263609"></a><a name="_Toc513905657"></a><a name="_Toc513905879"></a><a name="_Toc513905953"></a><a name="_Toc526331340"></a><a name="_Toc76437704"></a><a name="_Toc98128226"></a><a name="_Toc115159677"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Severability</u></font></a>.&nbsp; If at any time subsequent to the date of this Agreement, any provision of this Agreement shall be held by any court of
competent jurisdiction to be illegal, void or unenforceable, such provision shall be of no force and effect, but the illegality or</p>

<h2><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></h2>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-16-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">unenforceability of such provision shall have no effect upon and shall not impair the enforceability of any other provision of this Agreement.<a name="_Toc505064265"></a></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513263610"></a><a name="_Toc513905658"></a><a name="_Toc513905880"></a><a name="_Toc513905954"></a><a name="_Toc526331341"></a><a name="_Toc76437705"></a><a name="_Toc98128227"></a><a name="_Toc115159678"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>No Waiver</u></font></a>.&nbsp; The failure of a Party at any time or times to require performance of any provision this Agreement shall not affect the right at
a later time to enforce the same.&nbsp; No waiver by a Party of any condition, and no breach of any provision, term, covenant, representation or warranty contained in this Agreement, whether by conduct or otherwise, in any one or more instances, shall be deemed to be
construed as a further or continuing waiver of any such condition or of the breach of any other provision, term, covenant, representation or warranty of this Agreement. <a name="_Toc505064266"></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513263611"></a><a name="_Toc513905659"></a><a name="_Toc513905881"></a><a name="_Toc513905955"></a><a name="_Toc526331342"></a><a name="_Toc76437706"></a><a name="_Toc98128228"></a><a name="_Toc115159679"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.9&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Counterparts</u></font></a>.&nbsp; <a name="_Toc505064268">This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which, by facsimile or otherwise,
shall be deemed an original, but all of which together shall constitute but one and the same original instrument.</a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513263613"></a><a name="_Toc513905660"></a><a name="_Toc513905882"></a><a name="_Toc513905956"></a><a name="_Toc526331343"></a><a name="_Toc76437707"></a><a name="_Toc98128229"></a><a name="_Toc115159680"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.10&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Survival</u></font></a>.&nbsp; Except as otherwise expressly provided, all representations, warranties and covenants under this Agreement, except as otherwise noted, shall
survive until (but only until) the earlier to occur of (i) the Execution Date or (ii) the Termination Date.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905662"></a><a name="_Toc513905884"></a><a name="_Toc513905958"></a><a name="_Toc526331345"></a><a name="_Toc76437709"></a><a name="_Toc98128230"></a><a name="_Toc115159681"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.11&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>No Implied Covenants</u></font></a>.&nbsp; No implied term, covenant, condition or provision of any kind whatsoever shall affect either of the Parties&rsquo; respective
rights and obligations hereunder, including rights and obligations with respect to exploration, development, mining, processing and marketing of minerals, and the only terms, covenants, conditions or provisions which shall in any way affect any of their respective
rights and obligations shall be those expressly set forth in this Agreement.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905663"></a><a name="_Toc513905885"></a><a name="_Toc513905959"></a><a name="_Toc526331346"></a><a name="_Toc76437710"></a><a name="_Toc98128231"></a><a name="_Toc115159682"><font size="3" face="Times New
Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.12&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Force Majeure</u></font></a>.&nbsp; The Parties exclude and expressly waive any claim of delay, waiver or relief of compliance or release of obligation for reasons of force
majeure.&nbsp; The Initial Period shall not be extended for any additional period of time based on a claim of force majeure.</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc513905664"></a><a name="_Toc513905886"></a><a name="_Toc513905960"></a><a name="_Toc523580751"></a><a name="_Toc526331347"></a><a name="_Toc76437711"></a><a name="_Ref88472699"></a><a name="_Ref89573391"></a><a name="_Toc98128232"></a><a name=
"_Toc115159683"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.13&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Other Business Opportunities</u></font><u>/No Partnership</u>.</a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <a name="_Toc523580752">This Agreement
is, and the rights and obligations of the Parties are, strictly limited to the matters set forth in this Agreement.&nbsp; Subject to the provisions of Article VI relating to maintenance of the Site, each of the Parties shall have the free and unrestricted right to
independently engage in and receive the full benefits of any and all business ventures of any sort whatever, whether or not competitive with the matters contemplated by this Agreement, without consulting the other or inviting or allowing the other to participate
therein. &nbsp; The doctrines of &ldquo;corporate opportunity&rdquo; or &ldquo;business opportunity&rdquo; shall not be applied to any other activity, venture or operation of either Party, whether adjacent to, nearby or removed from the Site, and neither Party shall
have any obligation to the other with respect to any opportunity to acquire any interest in any property outside the Site at any time, or within the Site after termination of this Agreement, regardless of whether the incentive or opportunity of a Party to acquire any
such property interest may be based, in whole or in part, upon information learned during the course of operations or activities under this Agreement.</a></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><a name="_Toc523580753"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nothing contained
in this Agreement shall be deemed to constitute either Party the partner of the other, nor, except as otherwise herein expressly provided, to constitute</font></a></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">-17-</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">either Party the agent or legal representative of the other, nor to create any fiduciary relationship between them.&nbsp; It is not the intention of the Party to create, nor shall this Agreement be construed to create, any
mining, commercial or other partnership.&nbsp; Neither Party shall have any authority to act for or to assume any obligation or responsibility on behalf of the other Party, except as otherwise expressly provided herein.&nbsp; The rights, duties, obligations and
liabilities of the Party shall be several and not joint or collective.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.14&nbsp;&nbsp; <a name="_Toc513905666"></a><a name="_Toc513905888"></a><a name="_Toc513905962"></a><a name="_Toc526331349"></a><a name="_Toc76437713"></a><a
name="_Toc98128234"></a><a name="_Toc115159684"><u>Further Assurance</u></a>.&nbsp; At the request of either Party, the Parties shall take such reasonable actions, and execute and deliver any further instruments, agreements, documents or other papers reasonably
requested by either Party to effect the purposes of this Agreement and the transactions contemplated hereby.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 12.15&nbsp;&nbsp; <a name="_Ref84311261"></a><a name="_Toc85859003"></a><a name="_Toc92017419"></a><a name="_Toc98128235"></a><a name="_Ref104807131"></a><a
name="_Toc115159685"><u>Governing Law; Jurisdiction, Venue; Waiver of Jury Trial</u><u>, Injunction</u></a>.&nbsp; This Agreement shall be construed in accordance with and governed by the laws of the State of New York.&nbsp; Each Party hereby (a) irrevocably submits
to the non-exclusive personal jurisdiction of any Wyoming state or federal court over any claim or dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement and irrevocably agrees that all such claims and disputes may be heard and determined in such Wyoming state or
federal court, and (b) irrevocably waives, to the fullest extent permitted by applicable Law, any objection it may now or hereafter have to the laying of venue in any proceeding brought in a Wyoming state or federal court and any claim that any such proceeding
brought in a Wyoming state or federal court has been brought in an inconvenient forum; provided, however,<i></i>that nothing contained in this Section 12.15 is intended to waive the right of either Party to remove any such action or proceeding commenced in any such
Wyoming state court to an appropriate Wyoming federal court to the extent the basis for such removal exists under applicable law.&nbsp; Operator acknowledges and agrees that irreparable damage could occur to the Site if Operator fails to perform any of the provisions
of this Agreement in accordance with their specific terms.&nbsp; Accordingly, Arch Coal shall be entitled to equitable relief, including the remedy of an injunction, to prevent breaches of this Agreement and to enforce specifically its provisions in any court of the
United States or any state having jurisdiction, this being in addition to any other remedy to which Arch Coal may be entitled at law or in equity.&nbsp; Each Party hereby irrevocably agrees that service of process may be made on it by mailing, by certified mail, a
copy of such process to such Party at its address for notices specified herein.&nbsp; Each Party agrees that a final judgment in any such action or proceeding shall be conclusive and may be enforced in other jurisdictions by suit on the judgment or in any other
manner provided by Governmental Requirements.&nbsp; Nothing in this Section 12.15 shall affect the right of either Party to serve legal process in any other manner permitted by Governmental Requirements or affect the right of either Party to bring any action or
proceeding in the courts of any other jurisdictions, domestic or foreign.&nbsp; <b><font color="black">ARCH COAL AND OPERATOR HEREBY WAIVE ANY RIGHT TO TRIAL BY JURY IN ANY ACTION AT LAW OR IN EQUITY OR IN ANY OTHER PROCEEDING BASED ON OR PERTAINING TO THIS
AGREEMENT</font></b><font color="black">.</font></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

officers as of the Effective Date.</font></p>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">ARCH COAL, INC.</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><i><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">a Delaware corporation</font></i></p>
</td>

<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p align="center"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="black" align="center" />
</div>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">STOCK PURCHASE AND WARRANT AGREEMENT</font></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Stock Purchase and Warrant Agreement (this &ldquo;<u>Agreement</u>&rdquo;), dated as of October&nbsp;5, 2005 is between KFx Inc., a Delaware corporation
(&ldquo;<u>KFx</u>&rdquo;), and Arch Coal, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&ldquo;<u>Arch</u>&rdquo;).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Recitals</font></u></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A coal beneficiation plant with an initial design capacity of 8,000,000 tons per year, using a patented technology
known as the K-Fuel Technology, is (subject to the terms of the Master Agreement referenced below) planned to be located and built on the Coal Creek Properties owned by Ark Land Company, an affiliate of Arch, in Campbell County, Wyoming (the &ldquo;<u>Coal Creek
Plant</u>&rdquo;) by</font> KFx Plant II, LLC, an affiliate of KFx (&ldquo;Operator&rdquo;).</p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simultaneously with the execution of this Agreement, KFx and Arch are entering into a Master Agreement that
contemplates the potential execution by the parties of certain required agreements related to the design, planning, permitting, development, construction and operation of the Coal Creek Plant (collectively, as defined in the Master Agreement, the &ldquo;<u>Operative
Agreements</u>&rdquo;).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; C.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Arch desires to purchase shares of KFx common stock in connection with its entry into the Master Agreement and
this Agreement.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KFx and Arch desire to set forth the terms on which KFx shall grant Arch a warrant to purchase a certain
additional amount of KFx common stock.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><b><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Agreement</font></u></b></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In consideration of the covenants and agreements contained herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby
acknowledged, KFx and Arch hereby agree as follows:</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Purchase of Common Stock</u>.&nbsp; Arch hereby agrees to purchase the number of shares of the common
stock, par value $.001 per share, of KFx (the &ldquo;<u>Common Stock</u>&rdquo;) equal to the result obtained by dividing (x) the amount of $3,000,000 by (y) the Pre-Announcement Price (as defined below).&nbsp; Arch is, contemporaneously with its execution and
delivery to KFx of this Agreement and the Master Agreement, delivering the amount of $3,000,000 to KFx by wire transfer in immediately available funds, to an account designated in writing by KFx.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Warrant</u>.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Grant of the Warrant</u>.&nbsp; KFx hereby
grants to Arch the right and option (this &ldquo;<u>Warrant</u>&rdquo;) to purchase, on the terms and conditions hereinafter set forth, shares of Common Stock, in the following tranches:</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">Page 2 of 16</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Tranche A</font></u></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The number of shares of Common Stock for which the Warrant shall be exercisable under Tranche A (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche A Shares</u>&rdquo;) shall be equal to the result obtained by dividing (x) the amount of $7,000,000 by (y)
the Pre-Announcement Price (as defined below).&nbsp; The purchase price of the Tranche A Shares shall be the Pre-Announcement Price multiplied by the number of Tranche A Shares being purchased (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche A Exercise Price</u>&rdquo;).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The Warrant shall be exercisable for Tranche A Shares from the date hereof until 5 p.m., Denver time, on the 30th day immediately following the date on which Arch receives written notice from KFx of Completion of Fort Union
Plant Commissioning (as defined below), at KFx&rsquo;s plant at 3574 Garner Lake Road, Gillette, Wyoming (the &ldquo;<u>Fort Union Plant</u>&rdquo;).&nbsp; The &ldquo;<u>Completion of&nbsp; Fort Union Plant Commissioning</u>&rdquo; shall mean the first calendar day
after the successful completion of a performance test (over three consecutive days) covering each processor in the Fort Union Plant that shows that each processor is achieving a minimum of 75% of its initial design capacity.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Tranche B</font></u></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The number of shares of Common Stock for which the Warrant shall be exercisable under Tranche B (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche B Shares</u>&rdquo;) shall be equal to the result obtained by dividing (x) the amount of $10,000,000 by (y)
the Pre-Announcement Price plus $1.00.&nbsp; The purchase price of the Tranche B Shares shall be the Pre-Announcement Price plus $1.00 multiplied by the number of Tranche B Shares being purchased (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche B Exercise Price</u>&rdquo;).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The Warrant shall be exercisable for Tranche B Shares from the date hereof until 5 p.m., Denver time, on the 30th day immediately following the date on which the Operative Agreements are executed and delivered by the
parties.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Tranche C</font></u></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The number of shares of Common Stock for which the Warrant shall be exercisable under Tranche C (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche C Shares</u>&rdquo;) shall be equal to the result obtained by dividing (x) the amount of $10,000,000 by (y)
the Pre-Announcement Price plus $3.00.&nbsp; The purchase price of the Tranche C Shares shall be the Pre-Announcement Price plus $3.00 multiplied by the number of Tranche C Shares being purchased (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche C Exercise Price</u>&rdquo;).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The Warrant shall be exercisable for Tranche C Shares from the date hereof until 5 p.m., Denver time, on the 30th <sup></sup>day immediately following the date on which Arch receives written notice from KFx of the issuance to
the owner of the Coal Creek Plant of all necessary permits to build and operate the Coal Creek Plant.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td valign="top">
<p><u><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">Tranche D</font></u></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The number of shares of Common Stock for which the Warrant shall be exercisable under Tranche D (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche D Shares</u>&rdquo;) shall be equal to the result obtained by dividing (x) the amount of $20,000,000 by (y)
the Pre-Announcement Price plus $5.00. &nbsp; The purchase price of the Tranche D Shares shall be the Pre-Announcement Price plus $5.00 multiplied by the number of Tranche D Shares being purchased (the &ldquo;<u>Tranche D Exercise Price</u>&rdquo;).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">Page 3 of 16</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">The Warrant shall be exercisable for Tranche D Shares from the date hereof until 5 p.m., Denver time, on the first anniversary of the date on which Arch receives written notice from KFx of the Completion of Coal Creek Plant
Commissioning (as defined below) of Coal Creek.&nbsp; The &ldquo;<u>Completion of Coal Creek Plant Commissioning</u>&rdquo; shall mean the first calendar day after the successful completion of a performance test (over three consecutive days) covering each processor
in the Coal Creek Plant that shows that each processor is achieving a minimum of 75% of its initial design capacity.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&ldquo;<u>Pre-Announcement Price</u>&rdquo; shall mean $15.69, being the average of the daily high and low reported sales price of shares of the Common Stock on the American Stock Exchange over the 20 trading days immediately
prior to the date of the public announcement of the Master Agreement and the transactions contemplated thereby.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Exercise of the Warrant</u>.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Subject to the other terms and conditions hereof, the Warrant may be exercised as to all or any portion of each exercisable Tranche at any time, and from time to time, during and prior to the expiration of each respective
exercise window set forth above.&nbsp; The failure of Arch to exercise all or any portion of any Tranche hereunder shall not affect its rights with regard to any other Tranche hereunder.&nbsp; Each exercise of the Warrant, or any part thereof, shall be evidenced by a
notice in writing to KFx.&nbsp; The respective exercise price of the shares of Common Stock as to which the Warrant may be exercised shall be paid in full at the time of exercise, and shall be paid to KFx by wire transfer in immediately available funds.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Arch shall not have any of the rights of a stockholder of KFx with respect to the shares of Common Stock covered by this Agreement except to the extent that one or more certificates of such shares shall have been
delivered to Arch, or Arch has been determined to be a stockholder of record by the KFx Board of Directors, upon due exercise of the Warrant.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prior to any exercise of the Warrant by Arch, Arch may provide KFx written notice of such proposed exercise.&nbsp; Within ten calendar days of KFx&rsquo;s receipt of such notice, KFx shall provide to Arch an
officer&rsquo;s certificate to the effect that, except as set forth in an accompanying disclosure schedule or in KFx&rsquo;s public filings available via the Securities and Exchange Commission&rsquo;s Edgar System, each of the representations and warranties of KFx
set forth in Section 4 hereof is true and correct as of the date of such certificate (except to the extent that such representations and warranties speak as of another date).</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Issuance of Shares</u>.&nbsp; Upon
KFx&rsquo;s determination that the Warrant has been validly exercised as to any of the shares of Common Stock issuable hereunder, the KFx Board of Directors shall cause the Secretary of KFx to promptly issue certificates in Arch&rsquo;s name for such
shares.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Warrant Term; Adjustments</u>.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Warrant Term</u>.&nbsp; Notwithstanding the
provisions of Section 2 hereof, the term of the Warrant (including without limitation each Tranche hereunder, whether or not then exercisable) shall continue only until the earliest to occur of (i)&nbsp;December 31, 2010,</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p align="center"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">Page 4 of 16</font></p>

<div align="center"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font>
<hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#999999" align="center" />
</div>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">(ii)&nbsp;August&nbsp;1, 2006 in the event Operator fails to deliver the &ldquo;Operator Notice&rdquo; (as defined in the Master Agreement&rdquo; on or prior to July 1, 2006, or (iii)&nbsp;thirty (30) days after Arch receives
a notice from Operator that it will not build the Coal Creek Plant, which date shall not be earlier than August 1, 2006.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Adjustments</u>.&nbsp; In case KFx shall (a)
(i) reorganize its capital, (ii) reclassify its capital stock, (iii) consolidate or merge with or into another entity (in which KFx is not the surviving corporation or in which there is a change in or distribution with respect to the Common Stock), or (iv) sell,
transfer or otherwise dispose of all or substantially all its property, assets or business to another entity or person <u>and</u>, (b) pursuant to the terms of such reorganization, reclassification, merger, consolidation or disposition of assets, shares of common
stock of the successor or acquiring entity, or any cash, shares of stock or other securities or property of any nature whatsoever (including warrants or other subscription or purchase rights) in addition to or in lieu of common stock of the successor or acquiring
entity or person ("<u>Other Property</u>"), are to be received by or distributed to the holders of Common Stock, <u>then</u> Arch shall have the right thereafter to receive, upon exercise of the Warrant, the number of shares of common stock of the successor or
acquiring entity or of KFx, if it is the surviving corporation, and Other Property receivable upon or as a result of such reorganization, reclassification, merger, consolidation or disposition of assets by a holder of the number of shares of Common Stock for which
the Warrant is exercisable immediately prior to such event.&nbsp; In the event (except in the case of transactions covered above) that as a result of recapitalization, stock split, combination of shares or stock dividends payable with respect to the Common Stock, the
outstanding shares of Common Stock are at any time increased or decreased or changed into or exchanged for a different number or kind of share or other security of KFx, then appropriate adjustments in the price, number and kind of such securities then subject to the
Warrant shall be made effective as of the date of such occurrence so that the position of Arch upon exercise will be substantially the same as it would have been had it owned immediately prior to the occurrence of such events the Common Stock subject to the
Warrant.&nbsp; Each such adjustment shall be made successively whenever any event listed above shall occur, and KFx shall notify Arch of each such adjustment.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Representations and Warranties of KFx</u>.&nbsp; KFx represents and warrants to Arch that, as of the date
of this Agreement, except as set forth in an accompanying disclosure schedule or in KFx&rsquo;s public filings available via the Securities and Exchange Commission&rsquo;s Edgar System:</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KFx is a corporation validly existing and in
good standing under the laws of the State of Delaware.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KFx has the corporate power to enter into this
Agreement and to carry out its obligations hereunder, and the execution, delivery and performance by KFx of this Agreement has been duly authorized by all necessary corporate action.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When issued in accordance with the terms of
this Agreement (including, without limitation, the receipt by KFx of the appropriate purchase or exercise price), the shares of Common Stock to be issued by KFx to Arch hereunder will be validly issued, fully-paid and non-assessable.&nbsp;</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

general economic or industry conditions known to the public generally) that has not been fully disclosed to the Arch that (i) reasonably could be expected to have a material adverse effect on KFx or the price of its Common Stock or (ii) reasonably could be expected
to materially and adversely affect the ability of KFx to perform its obligations pursuant to this Agreement.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There is no action, suit, claim, proceeding,
inquiry or investigation pending or, to KFx's knowledge, threatened, by or before any court or public or governmental authority which, if determined adversely to KFx or any of its subsidiaries, would have a material adverse effect on KFx.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No &ldquo;<i><u>Event of Default</u></i>&rdquo;
(as defined in any agreement or instrument to which KFx or any of its subsidiaries is a party) and no event which, with notice, lapse of time or both, would constitute an Event of Default (as so defined), has occurred and is continuing with respect to KFx, or to the
knowledge of KFx with respect to any other party to any such agreement, which could have a material adverse effect on KFx.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KFx has delivered to Arch, or has made
available via the Securities and Exchange Commission&rsquo;s Edgar system, true and complete copies of its <font color="black">Securities and Exchange Commission filings.&nbsp; The</font> &nbsp; audited consolidated balance sheet as of the most recent year end and
the related audited consolidated statements of operations and cash, and the unaudited consolidated balance sheet as of the most recent quarter end and the related audited consolidated statements of operations and cash, including in each case the related notes and
schedules thereto, contained in such Commission filings (collectively, the &ldquo;<i>Financial Statements</i>&rdquo;) are complete and correct in all material respects, have been prepared in accordance with United States General Accepted Accounting Principles
(&ldquo;<i><u>GAAP</u></i>&rdquo;) (subject, in the case of the interim Financial Statements, to normal year-end adjust&shy;ments and the absence of footnotes, and subject, in case of the Pro Forma balance sheet to the absence of footnotes) and in conformity with the
practices consistently applied by KFx without modification of the accounting principles used in the preparation thereof, and fairly present the financial position, results of operations and cash flows of KFx and its consolidated subsidiaries as at the dates and for
the periods indicated.</font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KFx and each of its subsidiaries is in
compliance with all laws, rules, regulations, codes, ordinances and statutes (collectively &ldquo;<i><u>Laws</u></i>&rdquo;) material to it or to the conduct of its business.&nbsp; KFx and each of its subsidiaries possesses all permits, approvals, authorizations,
licenses, certificates and consents from all public and governmental authorities which are&nbsp; material to the conduct of its business.<a name="_Toc103483569"></a></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman"></font></p>



<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.9&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Except as set forth in filings with the
Securities and Exchange Commission, (i) neither KFx nor any of its officers, directors or &ldquo;<i><u>Affiliates</u></i>&rdquo; (as such term is defined in Rule 12b-2 under the Exchange Act) has borrowed any moneys from or has outstanding any indebtedness or other
similar obligations to KFx; (ii) owns any direct or indirect interest of any kind in, or controls or is a director, officer, partner, member or employee of, or consultant to or lender to or borrower from, or has the right to participate in the profits of, any person
or entity which is (x) a competitor, supplier, customer, landlord, tenant, creditor or debtor of KFx or any of its subsidiaries, (y) engaged in a business related to the business of KFx or any of its subsidiaries, or (z) a participant in any transaction to which KFx
or any of its subsidiaries is</font></p>

of any related party transactions not required to be disclosed in the Commission Filings.<a name="_Toc103483570"></a></font></p>

<p><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KFx maintains property and casualty, general liability,
workers' compensation, environmental hazard, personal injury and other similar types of insurance with financially sound and reputable insurers that is adequate, consistent with industry standards and KFx's historical claims experience, to cover all loss
contingencies which forseeably may arise in the conduct of the business of KFx and its subsidiaries.&nbsp; KFx has not received notice from, and has no knowledge of any threat by, any insurer (that has issued any insurance policy to KFx or any of its subsidiaries)
that such insurer intends to deny coverage under or cancel, discontinue or not renew any insurance policy presently in force.<a name="_Toc103483571"></a></font></p>

compliance with all applicable Environmental Laws and all permits issued pursuant to Environmental Laws or otherwise;</font></p>
